name: tickboxes

services.title: Society Management
services.description: We help you maintain records and resolve complaints in a systematic and effective manner.

services.title: Financial Management
services.description: Tickboxes takes on the responsibility of generating and maintaining bills every quarter for you.

services.title: Statutory Requirements
services.description: We also handle Auditing and generating audit reports as well as filing income tax, TDS and GST for our member societies

services.title: Technology Support
services.description: We provide essential technology support which reduces the burden of documentation and increases efficiency dramatically.

aboutpara: Tickboxes is an outsourced service that provides highly skilled society management services enabled by hand-crafted technology to suit your needs.
